rows: Upload an image from your image library or via a URL. This enables theAuto widthparameter. For this example, enter the logo URL in theUrlparameter.
The amount of empty space between the column border and image. For this example, clickMore optionsand set padding toTop- "0,"Right- "30,"Bottom- "0,"Left- "30."
html:
Parameter

Parameter value

Choose image

Upload an image from your image library or via a URL. This enables the Auto width parameter. For this example, enter the logo URL in the Url parameter.

Padding

The amount of empty space between the column border and image. For this example, click More options and set padding to Top - "0," Right - "30," Bottom - "0," Left - "30."
